ssh_ctx = ssh.SshContext('ubuntu', get_mock_key_file(tmpdir))
text = UNHEALTHY_OUTPUT_WITH_PERCENT_SIGNS
monkeypatch.setattr(Connection, 'run', lambda self, x, warn:
    get_mock_ssh_text(text, 0))
with pytest.raises(ValidationFailure):
    cassandra.CassandraStatusValidation(ssh_ctx, owns_threshold=40, hosts=[
        '127.0.0.1']).perform({})
